description:
Life is full of risks, from unexpected hurricanes to earthquakes, terrorism to cybercrime, always ending up with financial impacts. They can't be controlled but can be managed. Join Aon to help our clients manage these risks in the world of reinsurance. Currently we are looking for a Junior Data Analyst to work in our analytical hub for CEE (Central and Eastern Europe) and MENA (Middle-East North Africa) based in Prague (Czech Republic).

What The Day Will Look Like

Proactively connecting with colleagues across the region to understand and validate the data
Producing data analysis and reports for internal and external clients
Performing technical analysis and getting an innovative insight into insurance/reinsurance companies, their portfolios and reinsurance contracts
Building and maintaining dashboards and analyses using data visualisation tools
Participating to the united effort to improve data management

Skills And Experience That Will Lead To Success

Bachelor's degree in the fields of IT / Mathematics / Statistics / Economics
Fluency in English
Computer literate including knowledge of Microsoft Excel and if possible Tableau
Communicative and open to new challenges
Knowledge of the insurance or reinsurance industry appreciated

How This Opportunity Is Different

This is an exciting and varied role in the very international reinsurance industry. You will be provided with training to the world of reinsurance and our analytical methods, including Tableau. It is a superb opportunity to work for us, a global leader with a large data access. Competitive salary and attractive compensation package awaits you, including pension scheme contributions, language courses and high quality working conditions in our modern offices in the city center of Prague.

How We Support Our Colleagues

In addition to our comprehensive benefits package, we encourage a diverse workforce. Plus, our agile, inclusive environment allows you to manage your wellbeing and work/life balance, ensuring you can be your best self at Aon. Furthermore, all colleagues enjoy two ‚ÄúGlobal Wellbeing Days‚Äù each year, encouraging you to take time to focus on yourself. We offer a variety of working style solutions, but we also recognize that flexibility goes beyond just the place of work... and we are all for it. We call this Smart Working!

Our continuous learning culture inspires and equips you to learn, share and grow, helping you achieve your fullest potential. As a result, at Aon, you are more connected, more relevant, and more valued.

Aon values an innovative, diverse workplace where all colleagues feel empowered to be their authentic selves. Aon is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace.

Aon provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, creed, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, veteran, marital, domestic partner status, or other legally protected status. Aon is committed to a diverse workforce and is an affirmative action employer.

job_posting_title: Financial Analyst CIB BL STEERING | BNP Paribas CIB
description:
BNP Paribas EMEA Finance employs 500 employees, of which more than 325 are based in Madrid. We manage more than 250 BNP Paribas entities from all over Europe, covering +60% of Group‚Äôs balance sheet and all group‚Äôs banking activities (Corporate & Investment Banking, Retail Banking, Personal Finance and other financial services activities‚Ä¶).

Our mission is to measure, control and explain all the financial indicators required to monitor accounting, tax, regulatory, liquidity, credit risk reporting and management result activities.

Context And Team Description

Within CIB Business Line Steering, BP2S (Securities Services) Performance Management team act as a finance business partner for Finance Head Office of BNP Paribas (CIB perimeter).

The team is:

Supporting Finance Head Office Division‚Äôs and Business line‚Äôs strategic steering.
Providing performance management reporting and indicator for all financial KPIS (P&L, Balance Sheet, Liquidity, Capital Cost of Risk) to support the Divisions and their business Lines analyzing and steering their performance.
BP2S Performance Management is in charge of Actual‚Äôs analysis and Projection reports by Business lines.
Ensuring the correction implementation of Group instruction.
Animating Client profitability reporting and cost monitoring analysis.

Infinity hub aims at:

Mutualizing financial, management accounting and liquidity reporting production, both at Central and at Regional level, in order to rationalize finance production processes and optimize operational efficiency within a centralized processing center.
Reinforce the control set-up, both at Central and Regional level, and reduce the operational risk.
Aligning tools, norms & methodologies, processes and deployment of standard CIB Finance applications/systems among the CIB Finance community.
Promoting process efficiency, supporting innovation and developing digitalization, as well as implementing robotics initiatives.
Strengthening coordination & (2-way) communication among the central and local team community, promoting best practices and knowledge sharing.
Creating international communities and synergies with other Finance platforms.

REPORT TO

The position is within BP2S Performance Management Division for BP2S Finance Head Office located in Madrid, and under the Head of BP2S Performance Management‚Äôs supervision.

MISSION AND OBJECTIVES

The team member within BP2S Performance Management is primarily responsible for providing oversight and control over day-to-day transaction operations and activities arising from regional production and dialogue with the stakeholders.

Provide regular reports, added-value analysis, comments and create a fluent dialogue with BP2S PM Head Office for actual PNL as well as participate in the preparation of Business plans such as Forecast and Budget.

MAIN RESPONSABILITIES:

He/she is responsible for the day-to-day operations generated though fluent dialogue:

Implement measures to standardize and strengthen interaction between Regional/Head office and Infinity Hub stakeholders
Preparation and animation of any associated committees
Coordination with Risk, Regional Finance, ALMT, Performance Managers (regions, central) and project team based in Paris
Elaborate reliable and quality indicators for expenses & revenues regarding Flash and Actual process
Ensures data quality and contributes to the enhancements
Contribute to Ad hoc analysis, new requests improving processes and providing value added commentary
Contribution to the monitoring and implementation of any regulatory requesting affecting the processes

Ensure delivery of on time and consistent quality Financial Reporting output, and actively collaborate day to day in production and budgetary process:

Animator of stakeholders, Bring added value interacting and presenting new proposal
Constructive challenge of the figures and comments
Help other team to evolve in the area
Contribute to the understanding of ad-hoc and transversals investigations
Enhance the content and automation of the standard management reports
Listen to client needs and be a solution provider to enhance their satisfaction

Supervise and ensure timely resolution for all issues arising for BP2S Head Office related matters arising from:

Accounting Control
Local Finances
Finance Accounting and Reporting BP2S
Synthesis and financial accounting or reporting teams

Ensure good coordination and that Business need are addressed:

Build a constant communication with business and Finance Clients, ensuring a clear constructive and timely coordination of actions and proposed solutions.

Control

Respect internal deadline (reporting calendar) and external deadline (official closings)
Observe the bank‚Äôs policies and procedures
Show proactivity by updating and following all the topics recovered in Remediation Plans and share Best Practices

Projects, Systems Support, Operational Process Improvements

Oversee the tools supporting the processing systems upstream/downstream to the platform that are under the team‚Äôs responsibility (internal tools)
Implement highly automated processes
Participate in the development testing and implementation of new systems:

Define business requirements
User acceptance tests
Training of Users
Trouble shooting after deployment
Requirements

Training and occupational experience

Education background: Business School or University graduate
Minimum 3 years of financial working experience preferably within a corporate Banking Company: financial control, financial planning and analysis, management reporting, audit (internal/external), risk management positions
Fluent English speaking is mandatory; as the job will be in this language

Hard skills

IT skills: capacity to use tools as Excel in a proficient manner and other Business Intelligence tools as, Tableau or Power BI, as a plus
Knowledge of P&l Performance Indicators is a plus
Knowledge on ERP tools is a plus

Skills and behaviors

Problem-solving and agile mindset
Effective analytical, organizational skills
Rigorous and flexible mindset
Strong sense of organization, ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines
Strong communication skills, both written and verbal
Strong preference on team work organization, being a team player
Proactivity on proposing and implementing agreed improvements, share knowledge and best practices
Ability to work in a changing and moving multicultural environment

Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion

BNP Paribas Group in Spain is an Equal Opportunity Employer and prides itself on providing equal employment opportunities to all job seekers. We are actively committed to ensuring that no person is discriminated against on the basis on age, disability, gender reassignment, marital status, pregnancy and maternity/paternity, race, religion or belief, sex or sexual orientation. Equity and diversity are at the heart of our recruitment policy because we believe they foster creativity and efficiency, which in turn increases performance and productivity. We strive to reflect the society in which we live, maintaining the image of our clients.

If you think that your profile can fit and you like the way we work, do not hesitate submit your application. We are waiting!

Primary Location

ES-Community of Madrid

Job Type

Standard / Permanent

Job

MISCELLANEOUS

Experience Level

At least 3 years

Schedule

Full-time

Entity

BNP Paribas CIB

description:
Jouw nieuwe baan- Data Analist

Wil je de kans om met analyse van zeer grote hoeveelheden data grote coperates strategische keuzes te laten maken?
Wil je grote impact maken op organisaties als T-Mobile, KLM, DHL, Douwe Egberts, ING, Xenos en Unicef?
Wil je bij het grootste datahuis van Nederland alle kennis in huis hebben om uit te groeien tot absolute data expert?
Wil je samenwerken en kennis delen met 80+ data specialisten uit alle disciplines (data engineering, technical web analytics, data science en CX)?
Wil je daar bovenop een onbeperkt opleidingsbudget en volop doorgroeimogelijkheden?

Komt er uit de analyse van deze vragen 5x een JA? Lees dan door, dit is voor jou!!

Jouw nieuwe werkgever- Grootste Datahuis van Nederland | Werk samen met 80+ dataspecialisten (data -engineers, -scientists en -analysten)

Deze werkgever is een van de grootste datahuizenvan Nederland en gaat als een trein. Opgericht in 2016 en in een korte tijd zijn ze uitgegroeid tot een organisatie met 80+ specialistenuit verschillende disciplines verdeeld over twee vestigingen. Dat dit data bureau hard groeit en het succes dat hierbij komt kijken is te zien aan de nominaties en gewonnen awardsdie ze de afgelopen jaren hebben binnengesleept. Voor grote corporates als KLM, ING en Xenos zijn zij de aangewezen partij om de grote hoeveelheden datadie verzameld worden verder uit te bouwen, analyseren en de business ermee te adviseren.

Naast de mogelijkheid om grote A-merkenop basis van jouw bevindingen te adviseren deel je jouw kennis, expertise en ervaringen ook met je teamgenoten. Waar je bij de meeste partijen als enige analist vaak alles zelf moet uitzoeken krijg je bij je nieuwe werkgever genoeg data specialisten om je heen om goed te kunnen sparren.

Kennis delenis een belangrijk aspect bij dit datahuis en daarom staat je ontwikkeling ook op nummer 1. Met een onbeperkt opleidingsbudget, groot aanbod van trainingen en externe opleidingsmogelijkheden zijn alle ingredi√´nten in huis om een ultieme data expert te worden!

Jouw nieuwe baan- Data Analist

Als Data Analist ben jij verantwoordelijk voor het visualiseren van de grote hoeveelheden data van verschillende grote organisaties zoals ING, Xenos en Transavia.Jij kunt als geen ander de complexe data vraagstukkenvanuit verschillende disciplines vertalen en zo adviseren op welke punten er actie ondernomen kan worden. Door jouw rapportagesen perfect ingerichte dashboardshelp jij de klant data-gedreven beslissingen te maken.

Naast de online datazul jij je je ook bezig houden met het analyseren van offline datavan de organisatie waarvoor je werkt. Met Google Analyticsof Adobe Analyticsverzorg jij de datarapportages en met tools zoals Power BI, Tableau of Google Data Studiomaak je de visualisatie in orde. Doordat jij je als expert volledig richt op alle data vraagstukken kan er enorme impact op strategisch gebied gemaakt worden!

Waar je normaal gesproken als data analist op jezelf of BFF Google bent aangewezen is er bij dit datahuis informatie en kennis genoeg. Door een wekelijks terugkom moment van iedere specialist ontstaat er de ultieme gelegenheid om te sparrenen van elkaar te leren. Even genoeg geleerd van elkaar? Dan is er ook genoeg tijd en ruimte voor een tafelvoetbaltoernooi en een lekker koud biertje!

Wat hebben we van je nodig?

Als de nieuwe Data Analistbreng jij het volgende met je mee-

Ervaring met Web Analytics Adobe en Google
HBO/WO werk- en denkniveau
Ervaring met Google Data Studio, Tableau of Power BI
Beheersing van de Nederlandse taal is een must
Een proactieve en leergierige houding
Talent voor tafelvoetbal is een pr√©
Enthousiasme om in een betrokken team te werken is een must!

Wat krijg je ervoor terug?

Een salaris tot ‚Ç¨46K bruto per jaar obv 40 uur
32, 36 of 40-urige werkweek
Volledige mogelijkheid om jezelf te kunnen ontwikkelen
Onbeperkt opleidingsbudget
Werksfeer waar familiegevoel heerst en iedereen zichzelf kan zijn!
NS-Business card of mobiliteitsbudget voor lease auto
Een pensioenregeling
Gezellige vrijdag middag borrels en elk kwartaal een teamuitje
Grote groeimogelijkheden in een mooie werkomgeving!

description:
Permanent TSB is one of Ireland's leading retail and SME banks, with an innovative range of products and services powered through an evolving digital landscape, our focus is centred on ensuring we deliver what our customers, colleagues and communities need to be successful.

In line with our growth ambitions, Permanent TSB has embarked on a significant digital transformation programme which will lead to enhanced customer experience, through re-development of the delivery channels and the ongoing evolution of the bank's infrastructure and operations in order to provide cost-effective, secure and resilient services to our customers.

Responsibilities:

Respond to alerts from security tools, with intelligence driven investigative analysis.
Provide first response support by analysing alerts and gathering information about potential incidents or vulnerabilities.
Perform tier three analysis conducting host forensics, network forensics, log analysis and malware analysis to determine the scope and impact of security incidents.
Develop and maintain incident response playbooks and other documentation relative to incident response.

Requirements:

3-5 years' experience in incident response, security operations, SOC or a related field.
Experience with deploying, maintaining or using the following security solutions: SIEM, DLP, IDS/IPS, EDR, Firewalls, Web proxy, Email Gateway.
Strong knowledge of regulatory requirements and industry standards.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

This is a Permanent role based in Permanent TSB's Head Office, St Stephens Green, Dublin \ Airport Business Park, Cork \ Work From Home - Republic of Ireland only.

Is this you?

Please apply online on our website or via the apply link of this role. Your application will be sent through to our Talent Acquisition team and they will be in touch regarding your application. We reserve the right to draw up a shortlist for interview. The Bank understands the importance of a consistent and relentless focus on championing diversity and inclusion. We aim to attract, recruit, and retain individuals with diverse backgrounds, skills, competencies and abilities to work collaboratively to enhance the service we provide to all of our customers and the communities we serve.

description:
QC Analyst Chemistry
Amsterdam | QC Analyst Chemistry | GMP | MBO4 | HBO | Laboratory Analysis | Quality Control | Dutch | 1046136 |

Your new role
As a QC Analyst Chemistry you will be responsible for performing chemical specialist laboratory work in accordance with the set protocols and quality frameworks. You will record, administer and check the incoming materials being used for plasma-made production, in a timely and competent manner, into the appropriate information systems. You will be supporting and conducting compliance research and data analysis, contributing to quality assurance. You will be working in accordance to GMP guidelines.

What you‚Äôll need to succeed
You have completed MBO4 Level Chemistry, (Micro)biology or any relevant Life Science field.
You have relevant work experience MBO4 at least 3 years in a pharmaceutical laboratory.

Experience working in a GMP environment is considered a plus.
Hands on quality-conscious mentality, ability to accurately and timely perform relevant data analysis while contributing to quality assurance.
Capability to perform required daily tasks both independently and on a collaborative basis.
Good written, social and communication skills in Dutch ‚Äì essential for this role.

What you‚Äôll get in return
Hays Detachering | This is a project that will start with a contract for 12 months through Hays. Extension to stay within the department is anticipated. At this position, you will get a competitive salary and your travel expenses are covered.

Your new company
Prothya Biosciences, an organisation committed to providing high quality plasma derived products. This is done through complex methods used to isolate proteins from blood plasma to transform them into life-saving medicines. Not only are they committed to patient care, they also develop advanced solutions for client partners. Prothya colleagues go the extra mile to deliver top quality patient care worldwide!

What you need to do now
If you are interested in this role as QC Analyst Chemistry, click ‚ÄòApply now‚Äô to send an up-to-date CV, or give us a call! Is this job isn‚Äôt quite right for you, but are you still looking for a new position? Please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

description:
Sofascoreis a Croatian IT company that has been developing digital products of the same name at Zagreb's Vrbani for more than 10 years. Our main products are our website and mobile apps (Android and iOS) for following sports results as they happen (live score). We offer not only current information to our fans, but also statistical data processing, analytics, player ratings and more. Our app is rated 4.8 on the App Store, which is the bar we're all aiming for.

The company has grown from two founders to more than 200 experts, and we're constantly on the lookout for innovation and improvements, as well as developing our existing products. Now we're looking for a Data Analystexpert to join an existing team in collecting, organising, and analysing large amounts of data, using advanced tools and state-of-the-art methods.

What will the Data Analyst take care of?

Implement, maintain and improve the data analysis system
Develop, validate and maintain predictive models using statistical approaches
Proactive preparation of reports based on collected and analysed data
Identifying business needs and assisting departments within Sofascore in defining the necessary analysis and reports
Infrastructure development in collaboration with the rest of the team
Cooperation with stakeholders from all of the departments within Sofascore

What characteristics will make you the best candidate?

Previous experience in Data Science/Analytics
University degree (FER, PMF, FOI, Computer Sciences, Business Informatics, etc.)
Familiar with the tools used in data collection and analysis (ETL tools)
Excellent knowledge of SQL
Basic knowledge of Python (Numpy, Pandas, Jupyter Notebook‚Ä¶)
Analytical thinking and proactive approach

Why is Sofascore the best choice for your next step in career growth?

In addition to a competitive salary, you have the opportunity to work in a company that has an excellent work-life balance (enviable number of vacation days, flexible work hours), a family benefits package, and which appreciates and rewards knowledge and progress by investing in your growth through international conferences and workshops.

You will work with top quality equipment in a nicely designed office, get a company mobile phone and a MacBook Pro, paid general physical examination once a year, and numerous other benefits that we would verbally communicate to you.

If you want to score big with us, send us your CV and cover letter. We are eager to meet you!

description:
The Pricing Intelligence Team within the Pricing & Yield department (P&Y) is looking for a motivated and driven Data Analystwho will help us shape our team, drive the company to the next level, and have the most direct influence on our success.

Wh o We Are

The Pricing & Yield department (P&Y) is responsible for the revenue optimization of the full network. In particular, our department aims to define the best possible pricing strategy to maximize our revenue given current and historic demand patterns, competitor actions, and our current and historic supply.

The Pricing Intelligence team owns the P&Y department‚Äôs analytical products: from data pipelines, reports, and ad-hoc analyses to tools and applications. We support the department and the whole company in taking data-driven business decisions by translating big data into actionable insights and building automated solutions.

Your Tasks ‚Äì Paint the world green

As a Data Analystyou will work on a wide range of interesting tasks to actively support the business teams in the revenue optimization process.

This is a highly visible role that requires rigor, self-organization, autonomy, hands-on mentality and entrepreneurial spirit, and will give you the opportunity to develop many transversal skills (visualization, analytical, commercial, project and stakeholder management, engineering, amongst others).

You Will

Create and maintain datasets (SQL/Snowflake) following best practices
Build, maintain and optimize Excel and Power BI reports following DAX and data modeling best practices, as well as draft ad-hoc analyses
Present your results and explain KPIs to a various range of stakeholders
Build and maintain basic ETL and deployment pipelines
Develop documentation for products and processes
Place the users first, by collecting requirements, focusing on their feedback, and constantly optimizing the usability of our products
Interact regularly with different types of stakeholders from our and other departments
Our Tech Stack

SQL Server
Snowflake
Power BI
Python
Jenkins and GitLab CI/CD
AWS, Docker, Kubernetes
Kafka
Your Profile ‚Äì Ready to hop on board

Basic Qualifications

You have 2+ years of experience as a Business Analyst, or equivalent
You have a master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Business Informatics, Mathematics, Industrial Engineering, Economics, Management, or equivalent work experience
You have a good experience in Snowflake/SQL
You have a good experience in data modeling, DAX and visualization using Power BI (or any other similar tool)
You have a solid experience in Excel and VBA
You are fluent in English
Additional Desired Qualifications

You feel comfortable using Git
You feel comfortable using Jenkins
You have a good experience in Python
Our Perks ‚Äì More than just a job

You have an impact. With innovation and smart technology, we are creating the easiest way to travel. We want your ideas and give you autonomy to make them reality.
Flix is flexible. Organize your own schedule, and balance work between the office and home as it‚Äôs best for you. We give you trust-based hours and a flexible smart working policy.
Travelling is our passion. Discover the world with your free Flix rides and bring along your friends and family for half price.
Teamwork makes the dream work. Our FlixTeam has people from over 80 different nations. We work in a multicultural environment where we can challenge and support each other.
We're not only green in color. We‚Äôre building for the long term, and that means protecting our planet. We constantly test new green technologies and compensate for the CO2 after all our business travel since 2018.
Your well-being is important to us. To treat your mind and body we will give you a competitive paid time off package, mental health support including 1:1 consultations with a psychologist, and a neat discount on UrbanSportsClub memberships.
Want to rewrite the history of mobility with us? Then join our ride and apply now. We're excited to hear from you!

About Flix

We are a global mobility provider with headquarters in Europe and the United States. Since 2013, we have changed the way millions of people have traveled, offering new alternatives for convenient, affordable and eco-friendly travel. Thanks to a unique business model and innovative technology, we have quickly established one of the largest long-distance mobility networks in the world ‚Äì and our journey has just begun.

Flix is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, gender (including pregnancy and gender identity), national, social or ethnic origin, political affiliation, sexual orientation, marital status, disability, age, veteran status, or other legally protected characteristics. All employment decisions are based on business needs, job requirements, competence and merit.

description:
Good day!

Do you get excited about new technology and enjoy trying out new apps? Do you have an Android device with a built-in stylus? If so, this project is for you!

At Appen, we are working with our customers to decrease bias, and strive for inclusive Artificial Intelligence (AI) that works for everyone. In this way, we can make sure that Artificial Intelligence performs equally well for all people.

Project Description:
This project will require users to submit 700 handwritten samples via a brand-new mobile handwriting application so that we can train machine learning models to automatically identify what people are writing. Because this project has very specific requirements, we have created this screening task to judge participant eligibility for the project.

Project Requirements:
Access to an Android device with a built-in stylus
Have access to a Gmail account
Able to write and speak fluently in Italian
Currently residing in Italy

If this project interests you, please fill out the questionnaire, survey, and consent forms to become active on the project. Once active, you will need to verify your mobile device through the Appen Mobile app to finalize your application. Make sure not to forget this step, or you won't be able to participate!

Apply Now:

What to expect when you register:
Create an Appen Account
Choose Italian (Italy) as your primary language
Complete your profile and project registration [5 min]
Study the provided guidelines [at your own pace]
Agree to confidentiality and ways of working rules
Pass the quiz

Thank you and we hope to work with you soon!

"Appen has a diverse, inclusive culture that is vital to our mission of helping build better AI. We offer opportunities for individuals of all abilities and backgrounds."

description:
About The Job

The Credit Transaction Management (CTM) Transversal Monitoring Analyst is responsible for providing essential support on the analysis, registration and follow-up of the Credit Mitigations Risks associated to the Structured Credits, within the Bank systems and to contribute to Finance and Risk Reporting and Control. The Analyst is responsible for ensuring that all processes related to the collection, input, analysis and update of security package data, covenant data, asset management data and ESG data are carried with efficiency and accuracy and are compliant with the Regulatory requirements assuring the permanent control and monitoring of the Credit Risk.

Your Main Activities Are

Work collaboratively with Front Office, Credit Analysts, Deal Implementation Team to take in charge the Covenants follow-up and monitoring, Security Package and Asset Management after closing of the deal
Identify within all Legal Documentation, with the assistance of Front Office/Credit Analysts, Legal or other relevant stakeholders, the covenants to be monitored and the securities eligible for registration (according to current regulations and procedures) and accurately map them with the Bank Nomenclatures, with the assistance
Input covenant data in the IT Tool Covenant Manager (CM), Security Package data in Received Guarantee Module (RGM) and Asset & ESG Data in Asset Module
Collect the exhaustive Legal documentation for a deal (Financing documents, Security Package documents, Legal opinions)
Collect the necessary information linked to Covenants (compliance certificates, Financial Statements), Security Package (expiring/ expired, validity, upcoming & overdue valuation), Asset Management (insurances, valuations) and ESG and update them periodically
Monitor credit / counterparty risks with reporting dedicated to Business & Risk (control monitoring of breach and overdue covenants and report them appropriately), monitor security package, monitor asset management & ESG regulatory requirements (such as Loan Tape)

Profile And Skills To Success

Bachelor Degree in Business Management / Economics / Finance and Accounting
Advanced level of English, both written and oral
Knowledge in MS Office Pack
Ability to collaborate / Teamwork
Organisational Skills
Critical Thinking
Attention to detail / rigor
Analytical ability

Why joining BNP Paribas?

Leading banking institution

BNP Paribas is a leader in the Eurozone, and a prominent international banking institution with strong roots in Europe's banking history. It has a presence in 65 countries, with around 190 000 Employees ‚Äì including more than 145 000 in Europe.

Our presence in Portugal

Since 1985, BNP Paribas was one of the first foreign banks to operate in the country. Today, the Group has around 7.100 employees across several entities operating directly in the territory, offering a wide range of integrated financial solutions to support its clients and their businesses.

International reach

Thanks to its international presence and regular and close collaboration among its different entities, BNP Paribas has the resources to support all clients with financing, investment, savings and protection solutions that help make their projects a success. BNP Paribas holds key positions in its three core operating divisions:

Retail Banking, a division that brings together all of the Group‚Äôs retail activities and specialised business lines
Investment & Protection Services that include specialised businesses offering a wide range of savings, investment and protection services.
Corporate & Institutional Banking division that offers tailored financial solutions for corporate and institutional client.
Diversity and Inclusion commitment

BNP Paribas is an equal opportunity employer and proud to provide equal employment opportunity to all job seekers. We are actively committed to ensuring that no individual is discriminated against on the grounds of age, disability, gender reassignment, marriage or civil partnership status, pregnancy and maternity/paternity, race, religion or belief, sex or sexual orientation. Equity and diversity are at the core of our recruitment policy because we believe that they foster creativity and efficiency, which in turn increase performance and productivity. We strive to reflect the society we live in, while keeping with the image of our clients.

Commitment towards work/life balance

At BNP Paribas we care about our employees wellbeing and promote a culture of good integration between work and rest. We believe our employees have rich personal lives outside of work, being fundamental to be disconnected from work to recharge both physically and mentally. Only through this balance we may all be at our best while working.

Remote Working Conditions

At BNP Paribas, we embrace a Smart Working framework based on trust, autonomy and collaboration. Within this framework, eligible employees can benefit from flexible remote working modalities adapted to our hybrid working environment. To guarantee a comfortable and efficient working set-up, eligible employees are provided with both the office and home equipment, are entitled to an equipment allowance and can benefit from exclusive partnerships to purchase additional equipment at reduced prices.

To find out more on why you should join BNP Paribas visit https://bnpp.lk/why-BNP-Paribas-Portugal

Please note that only applications submitted in English will be considered.
In case you are selected for this role, further documentation will be requested to support your hiring process.

description:
Everything we do, starts with you.Together with you, we build the most human-centric fintech. To enable everyone‚Äôs future financial growth.

We are looking for an ambitious

Junior Business Analyst (m/f/d)

(unlimited, full-time) Join our team at our location in Verl, Baden-Baden, Mainz, Berlin, Oslo or Stockholm ‚Äì flexible working conditions available

Description of position:

Us in Riverty are currently on the lookout for a Business Analyst to BI Analysis team. Our team is responsible for development and improvement of our BI self-service solutions, as well as requirement gathering from our internal stakeholders and communication with data engineers. As a Business Analyst, you will work closely with our colleagues in Finance and Data Engineering, and learn a lot about our data sources and processes.

As a Business Analyst, you will:

Act as an interface between internal stakeholders and data / BI engineers
Support in building, maintaining and improving Power BI apps and dashboards
Work on quality assurance and testing of new features, bug fixes and data model improvements
Support in building composite models and new measures into existing models
Work in cross-functional teams with travel opportunities to our European offices

What you should bring:

MSc/MBA in Business Analysis, Finance or technical subjects
High affinity to and first experience in Business Analysis, e.g. relevant internships
Good knowledge of SQL
Experience with Power BI, Tableau or similar reporting tools is a plus
Excellent knowledge of English, second language (e.g. Norwegian or German is a plus)
If you know basics of DAX language, that will be a clear advantage

We are looking for these traits:

Analytical, with creative, structured and logical approach
Detail oriented and able to work both independently and in a team
Excellent communication skills
Comfortable working in a constantly changing environment

Thrive at Riverty with great benefits:

Enjoy an open, trusting culture in agile teams and access opportunities within the Bertelsmann Group.
Prioritize your health with supported sports and leisure activities.
Grow together through Riverty Academy trainings and personalized development.
Feel valued with numerous employee discounts.
Our flexible working arrangements empower you to blend on-site collaboration with remote work, tailoring your professional experience to suit your lifestyle.

This list doesn't assure any certain benefits or actions. They might depend on the country or contract details and can change anytime without prior notice. We are happy to discuss these benefits further during an interview.

About Us

We are Riverty. And we believe everyone should be in control of their financials. We ask you to join in. Because together with you, we build the most human-centric fintech. We build on experience of more than 50 years. More than 5,000 people in 13 countries drive our company and contribution to society. And we have their backs. We make sure they feel supported and included: Across teams, across physical and invisible borders and across the globe.

Our world is growing. And we‚Äôre here. Together, we‚Äôre finding smarter, simpler, seamlessly connected ways to manage money. By leveraging data and financial technology, our holistic solutions provide flexible payments, smarter accounting, and fair debt collection, all aimed at fostering everyone's financial growth.

And. Everything we do, starts with you. Join us and let‚Äòs build a more sustainable financial future, together.

We keep what we promise:

More information on riverty.com/careers .‚ÄØAre you already convinced? Then we look forward to receiving your online application ‚Äì with just a few clicks.

We look forward to applications from candidates who contribute to the diversity of our company. We relate diversity in particular to the dimensions of cultural or social origin, religion, age, disability, gender and sexual identity.

description:
Entain is one of the world‚Äôs largest sports betting and gaming groups, operating both online and in the retail sector. With offices across five continents and licences in more than 20 countries, we operate some of the most well-known and iconic brands in the industry with more than 250 years of combined history ‚Äì names such as Ladbrokes, partypoker, bwin and Coral.

Entain seeks a talented Finance Analystto join Italy FP&A team. This is an exciting opportunity that blends an individual's passion for gambling, e-commerce and finance, while supporting one of the fastest growing businesses in Entain across all the Italian digital brands (Bwin, Eurobet, and Gioco Digitale)

This role will support the Digital Finance Manager and is meant to work with several internal customers, both in the Digital division and in BI, at all levels of the organization

Your Activities will include

Maintain and improve Digital P&L planning model for Entain brands in Italy
Dive deep into the betting and gambling business and processes to identify opportunities and weaknesses, providing data to facilitate improvement and efficiency
Improve and manage daily, weekly, and monthly Digital KPIs reporting and provide support on Executive management presentations
Providing analytical support such as the evaluation of business proposals
Support the Digital Finance manager in analysing and monitoring proactively expenditures ROI, effectiveness and payback (incl. customer incentives, bonuses, acquisition spend and brand spending)

Desired Skills And Experience

BA degree in finance, business, engineering, or related quantitative field
Proven analytical thinking, pro-active problem solver attitude
Attention to details and exceptional organizational skills
Capacity to work as a team and to prioritize workload
Attention to detail and ability to work to exacting deadlines
Team player and ability to plan and follow through
Excellent English communication skills both written and verbal is a must
Proven experience in Excel and experience with Tableau highly desired
Comfortable using graphs and other illustrative tools to present large volumes of data

Preferred Qualifications

Experience doing quantitative and/or financial analysis & modelling
Advanced Tableau, Excel and SQL skills are a plus

About Entain

We may sit on the FTSE100, but for millions of customers worldwide, we‚Äôre the brands they hold in their hands ‚Äì and heart. As the home of household names like Ladbrokes, Foxy and PartyPoker, to name just a few, we elevate lives with moments of excitement. And right now we‚Äôre elevating ourselves above the competition. We‚Äôre leading the industry in bold new directions - and it‚Äôs our diverse and talented team who are making this possible. Believe us, the best is yet to come. For our customers. For our future. For your career.

DEI and Wellbeing @ Entain

Our vision is to be the world leader in betting, gaming and interactive entertainment, and we know that the most successful businesses are the most sustainable ones. Diversity and inclusion is key to sustainability and success and our goal is to attract, engage and retain the best talent globally, bringing the best thinking to our business from inside and outside of our sector. Our ambition is to make sure everyone at Entain feels valued, respected and included. Inclusion is embedded in everything we do, because we know when we feel respected and heard, we do our best work. Sustainability drives everything we do, and doing what‚Äôs right is one of our core values. Diverse teams have more creativity, imagination, innovation and problem solving capabilities. We are committed to tackling inequalities and creating a diverse and inclusive business. Here, we celebrate our individual differences, and make sure everyone feels supported, respected, and empowered to thrive ‚Äì and that starts from the moment you apply to join us. We want our employees to feel healthy and supported at home and at work. That‚Äôs why we have our Well-me programme, which provides information, tools and training to help our people look after their mental and physical wellbeing in ways that matter to them.

Life @ Entain

We‚Äôre a team who love to play, and win, together. We love building bonds between our people, and we love to build your career up too. Join us, and we won‚Äôt just be your employer, we‚Äôll be your biggest cheerleader. We‚Äôll give you the power to lead the conversation on your learning and career goals from day one, and then get behind you with all the support you need to take your career ‚Äì and our business ‚Äì to new heights.

Apply Online

description:
Als Data Assistant onderhoud jij de relaties met onze 500 leveranciers van auto onderdelen en zorg je voor een optimale data inwinning ten behoeve van het state-of-the art Product Informatie Management (PIM). Sinds begin 2021 zet CODE de digitale strategie van alle AAG-bedrijven in Europa uit. Als zelfstandige startup bestaat CODE uit energieke en enthousiaste specialisten op het gebied van Masterdata en E-commerce in een grootschalige internationale logistieke automotive (data) omgeving. Je komt te werken op het gloednieuwe Europese Centre of Digital Excellence in Ede. CODE groeit snel en zet sterk in op data.

Wat ga je doen?

Je onderhoud de relaties met de 500 auto-onderdelen leveranciers en zorgt voor een optimale data inwinning, beheert de masterdata(processen) en zorgt dat deze altijd up-to-date zijn en voldoen aan de verwachting. Als master Data Assistant ben je verantwoordelijk voor het stroomlijnen van zowel de product data als de processen daaromheen. Hiervoor wordt o.a. gebruik gemaakt van een state of the art PIM systeem dat diverse onlinekanalen voedt zoals portals webshops en leadgeneratoren. Je werkt in deze functie nauw samen met collega‚Äôs uit de diverse landen en begeleid je hen bij het opzetten, inrichten en beheren van de lokale processen.

Onderhouden van de relaties met de zo'n 500 leveranciers op het gebied van data aanvoer en kwaliteit;
Begeleiden, adviseren en ondersteunen van collega‚Äôs in de diverse Europese landen op het gebied van PIM processen (Product Information Management).
Het invoeren, onderhouden, controleren en synchroniseren van masterdata omtrent artikelgegevens in het PIM en ERP-systeem;
Het zorgdragen voor correcte brongegevens volgens de laatste actualiteit;
Deelnemen aan diverse vernieuwende projecten omtrent technische ontwikkelingen en masterdata.
Desired Skills and Experience Wat wij vragen

MBO opleiding
Affiniteit met (master) data management
Goede communicatieve vaardigheden
Goede beheersing van het Engels in woord en geschrift
Goede analytische vaardigheden
Probleemoplossend vermogen,
Ondernemend;

Wat wij bieden

Marktconform salaris en goede pensioenregeling
Impactvol werk in een internationale omgeving
Hecht, nuchter, divers en gemotiveerd team met veel ruimte voor humor
Hybride werken in een groeiende en gezonde onderneming;
Eigen Academy voor jouw persoonlijke groei en ontwikkeling

Iets voor jou?

Solliciteer direct op onze vacature voor Data Assistant. De sluitingsdatum is 14 mei.

Wij hechten veel waarde aan diversiteit op alle niveaus binnen de organisatie. Het is dan ook vanzelfsprekend dat wij iedereen uitnodigen om te solliciteren, ongeacht leeftijd, gender, culturele achtergrond, religie en geaardheid.

Wat doet Alliance Automotive Group Benelux?

Alliance Automotive Group Benelux (AAGB) is onderdeel van Alliance Automotive Group Europa die op haar beurt een dochteronderneming van Genuine Parts Company (GPC) is. Wereldwijd de grootste distributeur van auto-onderdelen. Met onder andere een distributiecentrum in Ede, zes onderdelendepots verspreid over het land en zo‚Äôn 100 PartsPoint vestigingen speelt AAGB al jaren een leidende rol in de Nederlandse automotive aftermarket.

Svp geen acquisitie, wij werven zelf

description:
At LeasePlan, we are always asking What's next in mobility.

Join our team and be part of a dynamic, exciting and engaging business, so we can discover What‚Äôs next together!

Responsibilities

Maintaining Master Data Objects in SAP and Tibco EBX
Responsible for identification and specification of data quality criteria.
Provide evaluation of data quality results
Gathering data from primary or secondary data sources to identify and interpret trends
Adhering to best practices in data analysis and collection
Data profiling
Data discovery
Information chain analysis and management.
Responsible for elimination of root causes initiate actions to adjust some aspect of how the organization is currently performing data quality management
Proactively improving the quality of company reporting
Demonstrate technical understand of the data lineage
Identify data requirements across the organization by consulting with stakeholders (Data Element Owner, Data Stewards, Information Managers etc.)
Identify data dependencies with external information systems

Requirements

University degree (e.g. in IT, business, management, economics, etc)
Familiarity with Data Management principles
Experience with Data Quality principales and tools (ex. Trillium, Atacama), Master Data Management (Tibco EBX, SAP MDM, , Informatica) and Data Governance (ex. Collibra, Informatica)
Experience with Power BI (preferred) or Tableau
Experince with in programming languages - Structured Query Language (SQL) preferred
Stakeholder management and diplomacy
English (fluent, verbally and written)

Why LeasePlan?

LeasePlan is a global leader in Car-as-a-Service, with approximately 1.9 million vehicles under management in 29 countries. LeasePlan purchases, funds and manages new vehicles for its customers, providing a complete end-to-end service for a typical contract duration of three to four years. Through our NextGen Digital strategy, we are transforming from an analogue into a fully digitally-enabled business, delivering digital services at digital cost.

With over 55 years‚Äô experience, LeasePlan's mission is to provide what‚Äôs next in sustainable mobility so our customers can focus on what's next for them. We aim to build an ethical, inclusive, and progressive culture in which people can thrive and be themselves regardless of their race, nationality, gender, age, disability, sexual orientation etc.

If you‚Äôd like to learn more about our culture, DE&I journey and our way of working, please find out more in our sustainability section and our latest Annual Report.

Follow @NextGenLeasePlan on Instagram and LeasePlan on LinkedIn to check out what LeasePlanners are up to everyday!

description:
Job Description

This is Allego

Allego is the leading company for fast and ultra-fast charging solutions to companies and consumers throughout Europe. We deliver charging facilities ranging from regular home charging to state-of-the-art high power charging that can be used by all electric cars and every EV driver, providing a seamless charging experience. Our goal is to contribute to zero emission mobility and allow EV drivers to charge at the right place with the right speed. The EV market is emerging and changing rapidly. With our proven track record and long experience, we keep driving forward with confidence.

A Bit More About The Job

We are looking for a new team member to join our Network Planning team, which is located in Berlin (DE). The Network Planning team is responsible for determining the right location for the right type of charger to support investment decisions for infrastructure expansion and to reach our goal of clean mobility. In other words: as a Data Analyst you spot locations where people with EVs are, or potentially would like to charge, based on lots of data. You do this through the evaluation of potential charging locations based on spatial, demographical and strategic factors and convert this into a business case. With your analyses you play a pivot role in the investment decisions for expansion of our network.

Of course you won‚Äôt do this alone. You will be a part of a dynamic international team. They will help you to get up to speed within Allego, but hopefully you can teach them a thing or two yourself, because a fresh pair of eyes always sees new things. The Network Planning team collaborates closely with related departments within Allego like Sales, Finance and Product Development. So you will operate in an international environment with colleagues from all over Europe.

Since Allego is one of the main players in this new and growing industry, you will be able to shape the future of transport and build the charging infrastructure of the future!

Requirements

This is you

With your excellent analytical skills, you recognize patters in big loads of data, so you can pinpoint ideal locations for EV chargers. You enjoy working with numbers and are always looking for ways to use data to improve results. Your flexibility, optimism and ‚Äúcan-do‚Äù attitude fits our fast-paced environment. You are eager to learn, highly self-motivated, and excited to work in the highly innovative and international sector of sustainable mobility!

As our ideal candidate:

You have at least 2 years experience in an analytics and/or e-mobility related position.
You combine your experience in data analysis with at least basic experience in geodata processing and/or business case modeling.
Excel has no secrets for you. If you have knowledge of Power BI or GIS (QGIS), we will be very happy.
You have affinity towards the EV and charging industry.
You are able to independently manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Your excellent communication skills enable you to connect and collaborate with multiple internal stakeholders.
You are fluent in English, and as we will expand our network to many European countries, you are not afraid of fellow-Europeans.
You are located near Berlin AND you are eligible to work in a European country.

This is our offer

Still with us and interested and curious what we offer? First and foremost, we give you: salary! Rent needs to be paid after all. Pension? Also covered. But more interestingly is what we cannot express in money: we offer you a challenging job with responsibilities and real influence, in a fast-paced, goal-oriented environment. At Allego you choose your own challenges, we will make education and training available to keep driving forward.

Having read all of this and still thinking that this is a great opportunity (then you are probably right), just apply via the link. Hopefully we meet soon.
linkedin_skills: Business Case Preparation, Data Analytics, Data Analysis, Analytics, Communication, Analytical Skills, Data Visualization, Data Science, Databases, and Problem Solving

Job description:

Job Description:
We are looking for a data warehouse operator to expand our project team. We are also happy to take on a junior if they have a passion for working with data and are willing to learn. A dynamic environment of the Rainbow project awaits you. The project aims to connect all banking and insurance companies in the international KBC Group and ensure that all data is stored in one central data warehouse. If you are interested in working with big data and are not afraid to join a dynamic project, we would love to meet you for an interview.
Although this is a project, we are not looking for short-term colleagues. Once our work on the warehouse is complete, we will need those who have been involved in the construction of the warehouse to stay with us and take care of the further development of the warehouse.

What is the role of the data warehouse operator in this?

The first upload of data to the system and its initial treatment.
Push data through all the defined daily/monthly DWH run including filling ouput datamarts and backflows, solving hiccups and issues on the way;
Optimise and execute deployments without mistakes and in time
Actively improve the DWH Operation, its support, and documentation in all aspects
Ownership of dedicated DWH component(s)

DWH Operator also:

Actively looks for any non-standard situations and problems in data in the tenant run, register and analyzes them, and makes relevant actions to reach optimal progress, including timely activisation of supervisor and expert support.
Takes over, checks and improves the operative documentation; registers and analyses any inconsistencies for correction / completion of manuals.
Continuosly improves his/her knowledge of the DWH system, its components, as well as source systems of Rainbow entities.

description:
Who are we? Amaris Consultingis an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade ‚Äì this is made possible by an international team of 7,500 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We‚Äôre focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.

Here's What Our Recruitment Process Looks Like

At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible.

Brief Call: Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!

Interviews(the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!

Case study: Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.

As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.

We look forward to meeting you! Job description

description:
ComparaJ√°.pt

ComparaJ√°.pt is a free and independent online comparison platform for financial services and products, with a clear mission: to help people saving time and money, in a quick and simple comparison tool.

Our goal is for Portuguese consumers to make informed and conscious financial decisions. For this, we provide a free, impartial, thorough and independent platform, where people can compare the various financial providers in the Portuguese market for home loans, personal loans, credit cards, telecommunication and energy providers, life insurance and saving accounts.

We are the #1 personal finance platform in Portugal for the users, our partners and media channels. We are part of Samlino Group, a European Investment Company that helps Europeans save time and money by making better choices about insurance, home services and banking products. In Europe, our sister companies are: Samlino.dk (Denmark), VertaaEnsin.fi (Finland), TopCompare.be & Tariefchecker.be (Belgium), and Pricefox.gr (Greece).

What You'll Do

Reporting to the Financial Controller, you will support:

Revenue closing;
Confirmation of unbilled revenue with partners: reconciliation of full data with partner data;
Confirmation of membership costs;
Issuance and registration of invoices;
Maintaining the register of partner contracts.

What We Expect From You

You possess an unparalleled work ethic with a high sense of urgency. You have a relentless drive and desire to be the very best at what you do. You take ownership of everything you do, are proactive and follow through on commitments. Moreover, you're humble and you share our passion for building and executing new businesses. Furthermore, we expect that you:

Have acquired a bachelor degree in Accountability, Management, Economics, Finance or another related field. Financial knowledge is a plus.
You are a fresh graduate looking for a first experience in a fast-paced working environment.
You are knowledgeable in MS Office.
You have a strong sense of ownership and initiative and a genuine interest in learning and act on the desire.
You have a strong affinity for critical thinking, analytical, hands-on execution, problem-solving, and result-orientation.
Ideally you are available to start in May 2023 and have an EU work permit.

What We Offer

A workplace with great talents and leaders that will inspire and challenge you daily.
Competitive compensation and benefits.
Assume responsibility and decision-making authority from your first day.
Work on exciting and challenging projects and create an impact with new, innovative ideas.
Grow personally and professionally from working both independently and as part of an international group.
Work with and learn from experts and mentors in diverse fields.
Create strong and meaningful connections with your team members at exciting company events.
Be part of one of the most promising Portuguese fintech startups, with one goal in mind: help the Portuguese people saving money.

description:
Functieomschrijving
Sta jij aan het begin van je loopbaan, ambieer jij een carri√®re in de data wereld en wil je elke dag een beetje beter worden in je vak? Tijdens het traineeship van KVL word je klaargestoomd door ervaren data-experts, om je vervolgens te specialiseren als data engineer, data-analist of data steward.

Dit is wat je van het Data Heroes traineeship kunt verwachten:

Je start samen met mede-trainees met een basistraining in data & analytics;
Vervolgens kies je een specialisme en volg je vakgerelateerde- en persoonlijke ontwikkelingstrainingen;
Ondertussen breng je alle kennis in de praktijk bij LeasePlan Digital en bouw je mee aan het worden van de grootse leasemaatschappij ter wereld.

Oh ja, gedurende je hele traineeship word je begeleid door een ervaren mentor waar je continu terecht kunt. Klinkt gaaf, toch?

Door jou maken we impact
Ben jij iemand die altijd het maximale uit zichzelf haalt? Vind je het belangrijk om een positieve impact te maken? LeasePlan Digital kan jouw data en digitale ambities goed gebruiken! LeasePlan Digital is continu bezig met het verbeteren van de effici√´ntie en productiviteit in de wereldwijde auto lease-industrie. Met de digitale diensten van LeasePlan Digital zorgen voor betrouwbaar en effici√´nt beheer van lease-auto's. Wil jij helpen de automotive lease-sector te transformeren? Lees dan snel verder!

Met de kennis en vaardigheden die je hebt opgedaan, kun je echt een verschil maken. Als er een wederzijdse klik is, kun je na je inwerkperiode je carri√®re tot grote hoogtes laten stijgen bij LeasePlan Digital. We hebben prachtige carri√®repaden uitgestippeld, waardoor je op jouw eigen tempo kunt doorgroeien van junior naar senior! Alles wat je leert, kun je bij LeasePlan Digital direct in de praktijk toepassen. LeasePlan Digital is gevestigd in een levendig pand aan de Zuidas in Amsterdam.

Vindt jouw rol is bij LeasePlan Digital
Als Data & Analytics Specialist bij LeasePlan Digital werk je in een multidisciplinair team van professionals om data te verzamelen, te analyseren en te presenteren. Je bouwt pipelines, cre√´ert informatieve dashboards en optimaliseert het proces van dataverkrijging. Je bijdrage zal cruciaal zijn om van een versnipperd datamodel naar een centraal datamodel te gaan, met als voornaamste doel om de global data hub te bouwen en relevante data te delen met alle stakeholders.

Je werkt aan uiteenlopende projecten, zoals het leveren van dashboards voor operationele of financi√´le teams, het aanleveren van data aan leveranciers en het bouwen van pipelines voor datawarehouses. Als Data Hero bij LeasePlan Digital heb je de kans om deel uit te maken van een spannende reis, een pad te banen in de digitale transformatie van de leasemarkt, en een echte impact te maken op de manier waarop mensen wereldwijd gebruik maken van mobiliteit.

LeasePlan Digital zoekt versterking van:

Data Engineers
Data Modelleurs
Data Stewards

De kansen en doorgroeimogelijkheden bij LeasePlan Digital
LeasePlan Digital biedt een werkomgeving waarin je de ruimte krijgt om te leren en te groeien. Met ongeveer vijftien leads en een groeiend team van meer dan 150 professionals, zijn er volop mogelijkheden om zijwaarts of omhoog te bewegen binnen de organisatie. LeasePlan Digital heeft een functiehuis ontwikkeld waarin je je eigen doorgroeipaden kunt doorlopen.

Bij LeasePlan Digital werk je in een team waarin mensen graag een extra stapje zetten en waar ruimte is voor het delen van kennis en eigen inbreng. De data teams van LeasePlan Digital hebben een hechte teamcultuur en staan altijd klaar om elkaar te helpen. LeasePlan Digital zit in een spannende fase, we zijn bezig om de grootste leasemaatschappij ter wereld te worden. LeasePlan Digital in transitie naar een nieuwe architectuur en met nieuwe technieken. Jij krijgt de kans om hieraan bij te dragen.

Pas jij in het plaatje?
Voordat we inzoomen op de arbeidsvoorwaarden schetsen we onderstaand naar wat voor startende professionals we zoeken:

Een afgeronde HBO/WO-opleiding;
Uitstekende kennis van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal in woord en geschrift;
Analytisch en conceptueel denkvermogen en overtuigingskracht;
Jij bent een echte teamplayer en niet bang om vragen te stellen.

Communicatieve vaardigheden zijn bij LeasePlan Digital net zo belangrijk als technische vaardigheden. In de beginfase van je loopbaan bij LeasePlan Digital zul je met je soft skills je hardskills verbeteren. Je moet bereid zijn om vragen te stellen, op mensen af te stappen en proactief informatie te zoeken.

LeasePlan Digital waardeert zelfstarters en mensen die hun ambities en idee√´n durven te uiten. We zoeken mensen die goed kunnen samenwerken, maar ook in staat zijn om zelfstandig te werken en verantwoordelijkheid te nemen. Idealiter heb je ook affiniteit met data-analyse in je vrije tijd of hobby, bijvoorbeeld door je bezig te houden met home automation of het meten van je eigen prestaties.

What's in it for me?
Bij KVL ademen we data. We begrijpen niet alleen data maar juist ook de menselijke kant van data. Daarom kun je zowel goede primaire als secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden van ons verwachten:

Een bruto salaris tussen de ‚Ç¨3.000,- en ‚Ç¨4.000, (afhankelijk van het aantal jaren werkervaring);
Kennisdeling, veel fun-activiteiten en borrels met gelijkgestemden;
Veel professionele aandacht voor je persoonlijke ontwikkeling, bijvoorbeeld aan de hand van jouw persoonlijk ondernemersplan;
We houden je fit met een bedrijfsfitnessregeling;
26 vakantiedagen (op basis van fulltime dienstverband);
We houden je mobiel met een NS Business card;
Je krijgt natuurlijk een laptop en een telefoonvergoeding;
Een top pensioenregeling.

KVL: Bringing Analytics To The People
KVL helpt organisaties om datagedreven te worden en meer waarde te halen uit data. Wij bieden daarvoor een complete dienstverlening aan vanuit vier business lines: Advies & Regie, Strategic Staffing, Digital Data Solutions en Analytics Academy.

Hoe werken bij KVL eruit ziet
Vraag het een van onze medewerkers en ze vertellen je waarschijnlijk dat werken bij KVL voelt alsof je deel uitmaakt van een familie. Dat komt omdat we onze nieuwe collega‚Äôs in de eerste plaats selecteren op hun persoonlijkheid. Dan pas op hun kennis en ervaring. We vinden het namelijk leuk om met elkaar samen te werken, kennis te delen, elkaar te inspireren of een borrel te drinken. Dat doen we dan ook regelmatig op ons hoofdkantoor in de oude Van Nelle Fabriek in Rotterdam.

We zijn een platte organisatie die erg gericht is op zelfsturing, eigen initiatief, continue verbetering en op het realiseren van meetbare en zichtbare resultaten bij onze klanten en binnen onze eigen organisatie. Zin, wil, energie en drive om zelf te groeien en om actief mee te bouwen aan ‚Äòthe next level‚Äô? Dan zijn wij misschien wel het juiste bedrijf voor jou.

Morgen een kop koffie?
Wil jij jouw carri√®re een impuls geven de komende jaren door ‚Äòlearning by earning‚Äô centraal te stellen? Solliciteer dan direct!

Heb je nog inhoudelijke vragen over deze functie? Neem gerust contact met ons via recruitment@kvl.nl. Mariam neemt daarna snel contact met je op.

Bij KVL komen we altijd direct tot actie. De sollicitatieprocedure is helder en snel.

Na jouw sollicitatie nemen we bij interesse snel contact met je op. Dan organiseren we een korte telefonische kennismaking met Mariam.
Wanneer er van beide kanten een klik is, nodigen we je graag uit om nader kennis te maken en dan krijg je eventueel een online assessment.
Er is natuurlijk ruimte om kennis te maken met collega‚Äôs uit het team zodat je even mee kan kijken en vragen kunt stellen!
Nog steeds enthousiasme aan beide kanten? Dan sluiten we de sollicitatieprocedure af met een arbeidsvoorwaardengesprek.

description:
Who we are looking for

Knowledge and experience with SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL etc.);
1+ years of experience with programming languages such as Python and R;
Experience with data visualization tools, such as Tableau, Qlik, PowerBI, d3.js, or equivalent would be considered as an advantage;
Knowledge of the Jupyter IDE would be considered as an advantage;
Major fields of study in statistics, econometrics, data analytics or other relevant areas;
Strong analytical and communication skills;
Fluency in English - both verbal and written

Your future role

The Data Scientist will join a regional team responsible for developing advanced analytics products; applying data visualization and statistical programming tools to enterprise data to advance and enable key mission outcomes. You can expect projects in which we use data analytics to advise our customers on important strategic, financial and operational issues.
Carry out economically sound simulations and impact analyzes and forecasts the effects of changed corporate and corporate structures. Recognize the interrelationships in big data, illustrate them with suitable visualizations and make the flood of data usable for the successful implementation of complex corporate transactions. Link customer data in a suitable way to form complex data models and use sophisticated analysis methods - such as regression, clustering or and text analytics.
Work with modern analysis tools and use our powerful analytics infrastructure. Present and represent your work results to the customer. Bring your knowledge and skills to both customer projects and projects for the development of product innovations.

What we offer

Competitive salary and social benefits; New projects where you can develop your skills;
Real impact on the business solutions;
Work in one of the world‚Äôs largest consulting firms
Work for well-known brands
Additional Wellness days (4)
Healthcare plan
Health insurance (mixed package)
Working across multiple geographies and clients
Travel Insurance

Selection process

Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. All applications will be considered under the terms and conditions of confidentiality in accordance with the regulations of personal data protection.

About Deloitte

Deloitte is a variety of people, experience, industries and services we deliver in 150 countries of the world. It is an intellectual challenge, a good starting point for your career, and an excellent opportunity for continuous development and gaining valuable life experiences.What you only must do is to take the first step ‚Äì press the apply button and send us your CV, go through all the stages of the recruitment process and sign a contract with us. Deloitte is simply your best choice.

About The Team

Do you want to build your brand by working for a leading consulting firm that drives eminence in the marketplace? Are you interested in leveraging your analytical skills and strategic ideas to improve mission execution? If so, Deloitte could be the place for you! Our team brings deep industry expertise, rigorous analytical capabilities and a pragmatic mindset to help solve our client‚Äôs most complex business problems. Learn, develop, and grow in your career path!

Var Groupcon un fatturato di 572 milioni di ‚Ç¨ al 30 aprile 2022, oltre 3.400 collaboratori e una presenza estesa in Italia e in 10 paesi all‚Äôestero (Francia, Germania, Spagna, Romania, Austria, Svizzera, Cina, Messico, USA e Tunisia), √® uno dei principali leader nel settore dei servizi e delle soluzioni digitali.

Le offerte e soluzioni Var Group si rinnovano quotidianamente grazie alla ricerca continua e alla stretta collaborazione con Start up e Poli Universitari, consentendogli di essere al fianco dei maggiori distretti italiani quali Manufacturing, Food & Beverage, Pharma, Automotive, Meccanico, Fashion & Luxury, Furniture, GDO & Retail.

Scegliendo Var Group, entrerai a far parte di unGreat Place to Work. Nel 2022 abbiamo infatti ottenuto la certificazione, che premia la nostra realt√† come azienda nella quale si sta bene e si lavora bene.

Se hai almeno 5-6 anni di esperienzanel ruolo e vuoi crescere e dare una svolta alla tua carriera, allora stiamo cercando proprio te!

Var Group, pi√π che un luogo di lavoro, √® un ambiente aperto all‚Äôinnovazione, alla ricerca e alla condivisione di esperienze eccellenti. Una realt√† nella quale √® possibile crescere e ricoprire ruoli sfidanti, sempre in stretta relazione con i leader mondiali del settore.

Var Group S.p.A. garantisce un approccio equo, meritocratico e trasparente al fine di creare un‚Äôorganizzazione che ponga al centro la persona, valorizzando i differenti background, esperienze e competenze di ciascun individuo. Miriamo ad attirare, selezionare e trattenere i migliori talenti, attuando processi di selezione obiettivi ed imparziali ed offrendo piani di sviluppo professionale tesi alla valorizzazione delle competenze e delle capacit√† personali.

Collection has STARTED! Get ready to be part of an exciting era in AI-powered communication!

In AI-powered communication, data collection is a critical component to ensure that communication is effective and personalized. AI-powered communication systems use machine learning algorithms to understand users' preferences and behavior, which can improve the accuracy and relevance of communication.

Appen is an Information Technology company that specializes in providing high-quality training data, content moderation, and language services to improve the development of artificial intelligence and machine learning models. description:
Data Analyst & Operations Manager

We're looking for a motivated data driven person who will help us shape our team, drive the company to the next level, and have the most direct influence on our success. This position is available in Oeiras - Lisbon Hybrid mode (On-site and Remote).

You solve problems by connecting your holistic business knowledge, marketing understanding and deep dive analytical abilities
You are our truffle hunter, who quickly finds smart and pragmatic ways through complex datasets and recognises patterns in business KPIs and marketing channels
You autonomously realize projects in cooperation with other colleagues as well as with marketing channels which serve the management as a strategic decision-making basis for growth and excellence
You filter growth relevant information from our BI/tracking systems and convert complexity into simplicity
You find strategies to automate marketing campaigns, improve targeting and drive marketing efficiency
You monitor business relevant KPIs on a regular basis and find new ways for automated reporting systems
You monitor business supply chain on a regular basis to ensure our stock is up to our potential sales

Degree in Engineering, TI, Business Informatics, Economics, Statistics, Data Science or similar
Strong analytical skills: able to break down problems, test hypotheses, track the impact of solutions on the respective problems.
Great experience with tools such as Excel and PowerBI or similar
Know-how in Google Analytics is nice to have
Know-how in Facebook Ads is nice to have
Know-how in segmentation is nice to have
Fluent in English and Portuguese; every other European language is a plus

You have an impact. With innovation and smart technology, we create comfy sustainable shoes and digital assets for the future generations. We want your ideas and give you autonomy to make them reality.
At Undo For Tomorrow we are flexible. Organize your own schedule, and balance work between the office and home as it‚Äôs best for you. We give you trust-based hours and a flexible smart working policy.
Teamwork makes the dream work. Our team has people from 3 different continents. We work in a multicultural environment where we can challenge and support each other.
We‚Äôre building for the long term, and that means protecting our planet. We constantly test new green technologies and new opportunities, both physical and digital.

We believe that innovation and technology allied to sustainability is key to success in one of the most competitive markets on the planet. Our goal is to bring comfort and well being to our growing community.
Our journey has just begun. Are you ready to join us and help shape the future?

description:
Job Reference #

277350BR

Job Type

Full Time

Your role

Are you curious about financial analytics and its applications within the investment and risk management life-cycle?

Are you passionate about solving business problems and making an impact?

Do you have technical skills you are interested in applying within the Asset Management Industry?

We're looking for someone like that to:

work with members of our team to support our data, analytics, risk and credit research platforms
maintain and enhance the data content to facilitate reporting solutions for internal/external clients

provide front-line support to portfolio managers and research analysts across the investment life-cycle

perform portfolio and data analyses in support of portfolio managers and investment specialist teams
partner with internal groups across Global AM to scale our model for efficiency that will accommodate

and facilitate future client growth

Your team

You'll be working in the Knowledge Services team in Krakow. Sitting at the intersection of business and technology teams, Knowledge Services provides data and support to our teams around the globe. The team is a part of the Asset Management COO and has a mandate to govern and commercialize data through innovative technology and services.

Diversity helps us grow, together. That‚Äôs why we are committed to fostering and advancing diversity, equity, and inclusion. It strengthens our business and brings value to our clients.

Your expertise

You have:

‚Äì a university degree in an analytical field like business or finance or information technology

‚Äì an understanding of major security asset classes (equities, bonds, futures and OTC instruments) and key data attributes associated with them

‚Äì strong communication skills, verbal and written

‚Äì excellent problem-solving skills

‚Äì working knowledge of leading market data platforms (e.g. Bloomberg) is a plus

You are:

‚Äì intellectually curious, accountable and data driven

‚Äì a self-started with the ability to work with minimal supervision

‚Äì an individual who possesses a positive, action-oriented attitude and understands the importance of taking initiative within a team environment

‚Äì able to challenge the status quo and suggest viable and actionable alternative approaches

About Us

UBS is the world‚Äôs largest and only truly global wealth manager. We operate through four business divisions: Global Wealth Management, Personal & Corporate Banking, Asset Management and the Investment Bank. Our global reach and the breadth of our expertise set us apart from our competitors.

With more than 70,000 employees, we have a presence in all major financial centers in more than 50 countries. Do you want to be one of us?

Join us

At UBS, we embrace flexible ways of working when the role permits. We offer different working arrangements like part-time, job-sharing and hybrid (office and home) working. Our purpose-led culture and global infrastructure help us connect, collaborate, and work together in agile ways to meet all our business needs.

From gaining new experiences in different roles to acquiring fresh knowledge and skills, we know that great work is never done alone. We know that it's our people, with their unique backgrounds, skills, experience levels and interests, who drive our ongoing success. Together we‚Äôre more than ourselves. Ready to be part of #teamUBS and make an impact?

Disclaimer / Policy Statements

UBS is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our workforce.
